mapper.select:
SELECT FROM t_base_materialinfo
and f_mater_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{materName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and f_versioncode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{versioncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))

SELECT t2.f_bra_name AS braName, t3.f_ver_name AS verName, t1.* FROM t_base_materialinfo t1 LEFT JOIN t_mater_cigbrand t2 ON t1.f_cigbrand = t2.f_data_id LEFT JOIN t_mater_cigversion t3 ON t1.f_versioncode = t3.f_data_id WHERE f_mater_code=#{materCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
